ServerMania: Big Dedis Packed with Extras in Montreal/Buffalo/Los Angeles/New York/London Starting at $119/mo!

buffalo, cheap dedicated server, dedicated server, london, los angeles, Montreal, new york, New York City, servermania July 9, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Long time community advertiser ServerMania has returned with a fantastic offer.  Not only are there some great prices on dedicated servers here but they’re packed with extras:

  • Servers starting at $119/mo with e3 processors, 32GB or RAM, and 50TB of bandwidth
  • These systems come with dual SSD drives
  • Add 1gbps unmetered for only $60/mo
  • 100GB cloud backup included
  • Depending on the system you select, you can place your server in Montreal, New York City metro, London, Buffalo, or Los Angeles

Outstanding!  We last featured them back on November 27, 2020 during Black Friday and they’ve always brought great deals to our community.  You’ve seen their ads on our sites plus on some of our LowEndBoxTV videos.  We recently interviewed co-Founder Justin Blanchard back in January 2021, and their CEO Kevin Blanchard in July 2020.

Their Terms of Service is available on their web site (Privacy Policy).

Here’s a little about ServerMania in their own words:

“ServerMania is a Canadian company with over a decade of experience building high-performance infrastructure hosting platforms for businesses globally. We offer a wide range of fully customizable dedicated, hybrid, cloud, colocation and IP Transit services. Our mission is to empower clients by equipping them with fast, reliable innovative infrastructure hosting while upholding a 100% network uptime SLA. This is assisted by a 24x7x365 rapid response team – one with some of the best response times in the industry.”
